item.description:
This week we will participate in Maha Ksham Sadhana (Highest Bliss Practice).
You will learn a powerful personal ritual you can take home and practice in your daily life to:

  • calm the mind
  • savor your body
  • activate your kundalini
  • cleans your chakras
  • expand your orgasmic range
  • infuse your intention with the potency of transmuted erotic energy


    White Tantra is comprised of internal practices to cultivate your creative, orgasmic and spiritual potential. Learn simple yet powerful energy practices from White Tantra to:

    ♦ Access your power to Manifest what it is you truly desire!
    ♦ Expand your capacity for Connection and Pleasure!
    ♦ Become empowered as the source of your own Happiness!
    ♦ Ground, Clear and Protect your energy field!
    ♦ Infuse Passion and Vitality into all aspects of your life!

    This class is open to novices and experienced practitioners alike. No partner necessary. These are clothes-on, hands-off, solo practices, working with breath, visualization and intention. This introductory class lays the groundwork for my more advanced Red Tantra (parner Tantra) classes. Wear loose, comfortable clothing. Please refrain from wearing fragrances. Bring a water bottle. You can pay with credit card via the Paypal link, or bring cash or check to class.
item.name: Tantric Energy Fundamentals: Divine Elixir
